properties.name: hofund.info.application.name
properties.description: The name of your application (will be used in queries so simpler names are preferred) name from pom.xml will be use, whe you set this to @application.name@ .

properties.name: hofund.info.application.version
properties.description: The version of your application, standard approach is the version from pom.xml by using @application.version@ .

properties.name: hofund.info.application.type
properties.description: The type of your application, f.e. Backend / frontend / microservice / rest-api anything that you would like to group by default is app.

properties.name: hofund.info.application.icon
properties.description: The icon that you would like to see in grafana for this app.
